headline: Is GoDaddy’s (GDDY) AI-Boosted Profitability and Buybacks Reframing Its Core Investment Narrative?
summary: GoDaddy recently highlighted how its artificial intelligence initiatives, including the Airo platform and other AI-driven services, helped lift operating income by 17% and improve operational efficiency. The company is also using AI to launch new products such as agent name services and is actively returning cash to shareholders through ongoing share repurchases, signaling a stronger emphasis on technology-led growth and capital allocation. We'll now examine how GoDaddy's AI-driven...
